# All examples

This runs all examples of the tmap package.


## Normal size
```{r}
getwd()
x <- list.files("../examples", full.names = TRUE)

for (fn in x) {
	bn <- basename(fn)
	# todo: remove dontrun parts
	if (substr(bn, 1, 3)%in%c("tm_", "qtm") & !(bn %in% c("tm_bubbles.R", "tm_layout.R"))) {
		print(bn)
		source(fn, local = TRUE, echo = TRUE)
	}
}
```
